step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Try to bring your shoulder blades together and down smoothly.
Great job on the first set! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back.
Second set starting well. Focus on a controlled circular motion.
Good control here. Ensure the movement feels fluid and not jerky.
Excellent finish! You're doing great with shoulder mobility and lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You completed the shoulder rolls with good form. Remember to keep the movement smooth and controlled, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Breathing deeply during the backward motion enhances the exercise.
